definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Michael Jackson's sudden death has sent shockwaves across Asia and the world.
sentences.chinese: 麦可杰克森的突然骤逝，冲击了全亚洲和整个世界。

sentences.english: Springing into the table with alacrity, he drew his sword and swung it upon skipper Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷的冲向桌子，拔出佩剑向杰克森船长挥去。

sentences.english: Lives in a white-painted ranch house that he built himself in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.
sentences.chinese: 住在怀俄明杰克森洞他自己建造的白色牧屋中。

sentences.english: I was going to go to Jackson's Island when it was dark.
sentences.chinese: 我正打算前往杰克森岛，这时天色暗了下来。

sentences.english: Then I rowed it as fast as I could till I reached Jackson's Island.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我使尽全力，以最快的速度划到杰克森岛。

sentences.english: Jackson will helm the second film in the series.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的第二部将交给杰克森。

sentences.english: Bruce and Jackson escaped from the peril in a whole skin.
sentences.chinese: 普鲁斯和杰克森平安地脱离危险。

sentences.english: It was a moniker Jackson didn't mind one bit and he kept the donkey as his personal totem.
sentences.chinese: 杰克森对此毫不在乎甚至把驴子当作个人象征。

definition: Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
